mapper.insert: insert into tbl_third_yntrust_repayment_info ( createUid, createTime, orderNo, repayDate, realityPayDate, repayPrincipal, givePayPrincipal, repayProfit, givePayProfit, borrowingDays, lateDay, penaltyFee, latePenalty, lateFee, lateOtherCost, otherFee, overDueFee, amount, repaymentType, repaymentTypeName, status, failMsg, statusName, transactionNo, paymentMethod, paymentMethodName, occurTime, remark, pushStatus ) values ( #{createUid}, now(), #{orderNo}, #{repayDate}, #{realityPayDate}, #{repayPrincipal}, #{givePayPrincipal}, #{repayProfit}, #{givePayProfit}, #{borrowingDays}, #{lateDay}, #{penaltyFee}, #{latePenalty}, #{lateFee}, #{lateOtherCost}, #{otherFee}, #{overDueFee}, #{amount}, #{repaymentType}, #{repaymentTypeName}, #{status}, #{failMsg}, #{statusName}, #{transactionNo}, #{paymentMethod}, #{paymentMethodName}, #{occurTime}, #{remark}, #{pushStatus} )

INSERT INTO tbl_third_yntrust_repayment_detail ( createUid, createTime, orderNo, uniqueid, contractNo, repayScheduleNo, partnerScheduleNo, detailsAmount, checkStatus, recoverStatus, remark, transactionNo, checkStatusName, recoverStatusName ) VALUES
( #{obj.createUid), now(), #{obj.orderNo}, #{obj.uniqueid}, #{obj.contractNo}, #{obj.repayScheduleNo}, #{obj.partnerScheduleNo}, #{obj.detailsAmount}, #{obj.checkStatus}, #{obj.recoverStatus}, #{obj.remark}, #{obj.transactionNo}, #{obj.checkStatusName}, #{obj.recoverStatusName} )
